item.description: University of Massachusetts 3rd Annual Professional Science Master's (PSM) Conference When: Friday, November 4th, 2011, 9:00 a.m. – 3:00 p.m Where: UMass Medical School, Worcester, MA Please join us to learn about how UMass is leading in the small but national growing, specialty of Professional Science Master’s (PSM) degree programs. UMass currently offers 20 programs (second only to California) as options within existing master’s degrees in environmental, health and life sciences. All five campuses as well as UMass Online and the President’s office are participating in program planning and delivery. Designed in response to needs of industry, PSM programs combine science and technology studies with management and communications coursework. Hands on workshops provide opportunities to collaborate and further develop our system-wide offerings. Hear from and network with faculty and industry partners and join in this exciting university initiative. Questions contact: Susan Lawton, Professional Science Master’s (PSM) Coordinator - (978) 934-2299 or Susan_Lawton@uml.edu.
item.name: 3rd Annual Professional Science Master's (PSM) Conference
